answers.answer: well thats good news that your glucose test went well! 34 weeks sounds so far and your only 2 weeks ahead of me... but it still sounds like a much better number! ;)  before ya know it youll be able to stare at that precious face all you want <3

Well lucky you is at 34 I am trailing behind at 31 today!! Still feels like its going fast but I get to have my 3D on saturday and see my little girl again :) Happy for you that your test came back good tho!

question: Saw the doc today and I don't have diabetes, and the baby has hair. Almost done and I'm contradicting braxton hicks.  I had one before my appointment and one during a ultrasound lol.  She is face down and we still couldn't get a look at her face.  Oh well, I guess we will when she gets here.
title: 34 week appointment
